eu_initiatives:
ATT follows EU tax discussion and policy development including: 
 
Common Consolidated Corporate Tax Base 
VAT (including EU VAT portal, Mini one stop shop) 
Compliance of UK tax policy with EU law 
Tax transparency and information sharing (EU input into) 
European Taxpayer's Code 
EU tax identification number 
  
ATT also follows developments around the recognition of professional qualifications
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
